Orders

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • Orders.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRefundAble, java.io.Serializable

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IRefundAble
    Entity class to define an Order
    See Also:
